Control Name: REL 9.1 Identify and back up all data that needs to be backed up, or reproduce the data from sources
Control Statement:
Amazon S3 can be used as a backup destination for multiple data sources. AWS services such as Amazon EBS, Amazon RDS, and Amazon DynamoDB have built in capabilities to create backups.
Third-party backup software can also be used. Alternatively, if the data can be reproduced from other sources to meet RPO, you might not require a backup

control_attributes.Control: REL 9.1 Identify and back up all data that needs to be backed up, or reproduce the data from sources
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you back up data?
